originalText.text: We loved our Dr Nam and were sad to see her leave.  However we had a great visit with the new Dr. And look forward to seeing her again.  She was great with the kids and answered all my questions patiently

text.text: We loved our Dr Nam and were sad to see her leave.  However we had a great visit with the new Dr. And look forward to seeing her again.  She was great with the kids and answered all my questions patiently

originalText.text: Our visit to Park Avenue Smile was excellent. The staff is super friendly. The doctor was wonderful with my kids and answered all my questions.

text.text: Our visit to Park Avenue Smile was excellent. The staff is super friendly. The doctor was wonderful with my kids and answered all my questions.

originalText.text: The staff at the facility, from the front desk; to the MA’s, to the doctors themselves, have been nothing short of polite, kind, friendly, professional, and most importantly, accommodating and understanding. I have been receiving care at this location for almost 3 years; and beyond restoring my faith in good dentistry, they have restored the most important thing, MY SMILE. I would recommend this location for any patients, particularly anyone apprehensive to dentist visits.

originalText.text: I was surprised of hearing Dr. Naam having left but was immediately put to ease with Dr. Correa’s fondness. My kids loved her.
